text: Murat Aygün is a Dutch-Turkish kickboxer, who has been professionally competing since 2014. He is the former WFL Heavyweight champion and the 2018 WFL Heavyweight tournament winner. In May of 2020, he signed a multi fight, two year deal with ONE Championship. Aygün also previously fought in SUPERKOMBAT. He was ranked as a top ten heavyweight by Combat Press between March 2019, and December 2019. ==Kickboxing career== Murat fought for the HEAT Kick Heavyweight title during HEAT 38, with his opponent being Prince Ali. He won the fight by a third round TKO. Aygün won a decision victory over Tarik Khbabez, during Mix Fight Gala 20, after an extra fourth round was fought. Murat fought under the SUPERKOMBAT banner in 2016, when he faced Sebastian Cozmâncă. The fight went into an extra round, where Aygün won a decision. Murat fought Errol Zimmerman during the WFL - Champion vs. Champion event. Aygün won a decision after the five round fight. In 2018 Aygün participated in the WFL: Final 8 heavyweight tournament. In the quarter finals he defeated Fabio Kwasi by decision, Sam Tevette in the semi finals by decision, and won the tournament with a decision win over Nordine Mahieddine. He earned a reporter €100 000 for winning the tournament. After winning the WFL tournament, Murat entered the Mix Fight four man tournament, during Mix Fight 27. He suffered his first professional loss to James McSweeney by TKO, after the ringside doctor stopped the fight in the second round due to a cut. Aygün won a unanimous decision over Mohamed El Bouchaibi during Enfusion 95. He was scheduled to fight Levi Rigters during Enfusion 96 for the Super Heavyweight title, but the fight fell through due to a disagreement between Rigters and Enfusion co-promoter Ringfight Promotions. ==Titles and accomplishments== * 2018 World Fighting League Tournament Heavyweight Championhttps://www.perfectkickboxing.com/world-fighting-league-final-8-fight- results/ * 2017 World Fighting League Heavyweight Championhttp://mixfight.com/2017/04/Fotoverslag-WFL-SUPERFIGHTS * 2016 Mix Fight Gala Heavyweight Champion * 2016 HEAT Kick Heavyweight Championhttp://heatofficial.com/result/detail.php?id=1 * 2016 ISKA Oriental Rules World Super Heavyweight Championhttps://www.gnp1.de/thaikickboxen/allgemein/news/k-1-germany-grand- prix-pascal-schroth-triumphiert/ ==Professional kickboxing record== {| class="toccolours" style="width:100%; clear:both; margin:1.5em auto; font- size:90%; text-align:center;" |- !
